entries.npc_reset_3: I can't afford to leave these matters unresolved. Come back when you think you can help me close these cases.
entries.npc_reset_2: I can't afford to leave these matters unresolved. Come back when you think you can help me close these cases.
entries.npc_reset_1: I can't afford to leave these matters unresolved. Come back when you think you can help me close these cases.
entries.player_sorry_6: I'll keep working on the mission.
entries.player_reset_6: I don't want this mission right now.
entries.player_sorry_5: I'll keep working on the mission.
entries.player_reset_5: I don't want this mission right now.
entries.player_sorry_4: I'll keep working on the mission.
entries.player_reset_4: I don't want this mission right now.
entries.player_3_3: Why does Black Sun want to murder a Mining representative?
entries.player_sorry_3: I'll keep working on the mission.
entries.player_reset_3: I don't want this mission right now.
entries.npc_breech_3: Blurga will smash you! That will teach you to interfere in Blurga's business!
entries.dontknowyou_3: Go away! Blurga is in the mood to kill!
entries.otherescort_3: Go away! Blurga is in the mood to kill!
entries.npc_failure_3: I guess I better get the Mining Guild rep off the planet. We lose more of those guys this way…
entries.npc_noloc_3: My people are tracking Blurga now. I should have his coordinates shortly.
entries.npc_work_3: Did you stop that Aqualish killer? I need to know when I can let the Mining Guild representative return to his home.
entries.npc_reward_3: If law enforcement was not your choice of a career, I think you've undersold yourself. You've got the looks, the skills, and the nerve to be a top security officer. Best of luck to you.
entries.npc_backtowork_3: You seem jittery. I understand if you want to back out.
entries.npc_4_3: The Guild is negotiating with the big Corellian corporations for higher wages for their workers. Black Sun wanted them to drop the issue but this rep refused.
entries.npc_3_3: Well, you risked yourself enough on my account. No hard feelings, buddy. Take care.
entries.npc_2_3: If I get a promotion out of this, I'm taking you to dinner on Vreni Island. Please be careful. This Aqualish, a brute named Blurga Vuto, is one tough customer. If you want to take some friends along, I understand.
entries.npc_1_3: Just the agent I was hoping to see. Need your help again. I know, big surprise, huh? This time the assignment is pretty straightforward. We just received an anonymous transmission warning us of a potential violent situation. It seems a Black Sun gangster is on his way to a Mining Guild representative's home to murder him. I'd certainly appreciate it if you were to intercept this Aqualish and prevent a murder. If this Aqualish is the guy I think, arresting him will not be an option. Want to tackle this?
entries.player_sorry_2: I'll keep working on the mission.
entries.player_reset_2: I don't want this mission right now.
entries.npc_dropoff_2: I'd like to say it's been a pleasure, except it obviously hasn't. And don't think they're sending me to Kessel – I got friends in high places, pal!
entries.npc_takeme_2: Okay, okay! I'll go with you, take it easy. You bounty hunter types are so touchy.
entries.npc_breech_2: Everyone knows that liquid is not nearly as flammable as-uh, oh! Looks like trouble!
entries.npc_failure_2: Well, at least it wasn't a murderer that got away. You have to look at the bright side as often as possible here in Doaba Guerfel.
entries.npc_noloc_2: My people will get me Kalio's coordinates in just a sec. Could you hang on for a bit?
entries.npc_work_2: Did you bring my suspect in? He's likely to leave the system if we don't act fast.
entries.npc_reward_2: A huge thanks, friend. Here, go treat yourself to a nice dinner somewhere. Vreni Island is lovely this time of year, by the way.
entries.npc_backtowork_2: Did you have further questions or do you wish to reconsider?
entries.npc_4_2: A Corellian Engineering Corporation warehouse. No one was in it at the time. It held a lot of shipping manifests, however. I'm sure he was trying to cover something up for someone upstairs.
entries.npc_3_2: I was so hoping you'd say yes, but I understand. Not your problem. Excuse me.
entries.npc_2_2: Where were you two years ago when I got this assignment, huh? Thanks, I certainly appreciate your help. The suspect is a Rodian named Kalio Uldi. And be on our guard because even though he may be a coward, he's likely to have friends that are not.
entries.npc_1_2: If you've decided to hang around, I could certainly still use your help. I've managed to locate a suspect in an arson case but I don't have the manpower or the time to go and arrest this criminal myself. He's an arsonist and not a killer so I doubt he'll put up a struggle, especially if you brandish a blaster. Think you can bring him in for me?
entries.player_sorry_1: I'll keep working on the mission.
entries.player_reset_1: I don't want this mission right now.
entries.npc_dropoff_1: You're a pal and I owe you one. Take my advice: Get out of this town before it's too late.
entries.npc_takeme_1: Thank the stars you got here when you did. I'm sure those Black Sun killers are closing in on me. Let's get out of here!
entries.npc_breech_1: Psst! Hey! Over here! You from Captain Dynes?
entries.dontknowyou_1: Go away! I can't be seen with you!
entries.otherescort_1: Go away! I can't be seen with you!
entries.npc_failure_1: Looks like I get to add yet another unsolved murder to my pile. Thanks for nothing.
entries.npc_noloc_1: The witness should transmit his location to me momentarily. Check back with me in a bit.
entries.npc_work_1: Did you bring that witness back yet? I don't know how much longer that poor Bothan can last out there.
entries.npc_reward_1: Job well done, friend. I sure could use more like you on my team. Enforcing the law in this town is no easy task. Black Sun has a pretty tight control on the Mining Guild out here. Makes for some messy business.
entries.npc_backtowork_1: I've given you all the info I've got. You still interested?
entries.npc_4_1: The only one in a murder case I'm investigating. Black Sun is involved, which means that witnesses are all but non-existent. This witness only came forward because he thinks he's next. Can you help him out?
entries.npc_3_1: Okay, well then welcome to Doaba Guerfel and stay out of trouble.
entries.npc_2_1: You're a lifesaver. The man you're looking for is a Bothan named Lith K'alis. He's currently
He's convinced he's a target of Black Sun assassins. Problem is, he may be right. Have your blaster handy. Good luck.
entries.npc_1_1: Where's that witness? Why didn't you bring the witness? Wait. Are you my backup from Coronet? Oh, sorry. Captain Coraline Dynes. I'm the head of security around here. I'm a little busy at the moment so I can't really chat. Unless you'd care to help out? I desperately need someone to escort a witness back here. Do you think you could help me out?
entries.npc_reset: I can't afford to leave these matters unresolved. Come back when you think you can help me close these cases.
entries.cantwork: If you're like me, then you really shouldn't be trying to juggle too many tasks at once. Come back when you've cleaned some off your plate.
entries.next: I have things under control. I think. I'll let you know if I need you. Thanks for all your help.
